name: Bounce (itch) (RobertW)
description:
Game Info:

Puzzle game about bounce physics. Draw and edit lines to bounce the ball into the cup. Features 16 varied levels.

Controls:
  • Click & Drag - Draw Line/Move Line/Alter Line
  • Double Click - Delete Line
  • Space - Run (shortcut)
  • ←→ - Move Paddle (last level only)

Thanks for playing :)
